lender.name: IMPACT Incorporated !
lender.loan_because:
We support micro loans to entrepreneurs who have demonstrated their ability to build a business from nothing.
Our hope is that the borrowers will be able to grow their businesses, employ others, and will encourage and coach others to start businesses and succeed.
Ideally the borrowers we support will "Pay It Forward", by becoming KIVA lenders themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
We are two successful businessmen, one who lives in the State of Maine and who operates a construction business, and one who lives in the State of California and who is in the financial services business.
Our success has come from our own hard work and because we benefited from coaching, support and encouragement from others who have believed in us from the beginning.
Now we want to Make a Huge Difference by carrying on that legacy.
We utilize a for-profit corporation and a non profit Donor Advised Fund to support individual entrepreneurs, and groups of entrepreneurs.
We have the flexibility to financially support innovation in micro lending, by established entities like KIVA.

lender.occupational_info:
My company is called SimpleActions, Inc.
Its name comes from a "Success Formula" that can be applied to many areas, Business, Health, Exercise, Personal growth, and more... You name it - the SimpleActions concept can be applied. "A simple action, consistently done, compounded over time, creates a predictable and controllable result"
In the area of helping others... SimpleActions can also be applied. I encourage you to consider picking something you are passionate about and act consistently, over time, and help create a positive long term result!
Eight years ago I would have told you to "Get Lost" if you had called me about a Network Marketing opportunity, I had "Had enough of it". The concept of creating a large body of people making random acts of kindness intrigued me, especially when you consider combining that with the exponential grown known to be so effective in network marketing. I was introduced to the concept of network marketing at an early age and had been involved with numerous ventures with limited success.
At that point in my life I thought I would never do network marketing again. I had become a nationally published landscape photographer, I owned a small successful "Traditional" business, and I'd done the 'Corporate America' J.O.B., and been a successful real estate investor. Who needed Network marketing? As it turns out, I did!
You see, all the success in traditional business came to a screeching halt just after 9/11 took place. Little did I know how much life would change, or the fact that a network marketing income would turn out to be the only thing left that put food on the table and a roof over my head!
Previously, because of a few health problems, some good friends who owned a health food store had introduced me to a wellness company that happened to be a Network Marketing company and it happened to take off! Once my network marketing business became the only business to survive 9/11, I had a dramatic shift in my core belief about business and a new understanding about leverage. "Leverage works 99% of the time, all you have to do is be prepared for that 1%" - Warren Buffet
In just over two years I had gone from bankruptcy to a six figure residual income! All with the simplicity of sharing an online video and teaching others to do the same!
I had no money & no time, but Thanks to a lot of hard work, everyone in the whole organization, from the newest customer to the top company leaders, I have become a success and hopefully an inspiration to those out there looking for a way to do the same.
In Short, Bankruptcy to six figures, and maintained that for years now! Now it's time to give back and help others do the same!!
~ Ron Maurer SimpleActions, Inc. Boulder, CO

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because:
Having traveled extensively, I want to help improve the lives of the types of incredible people I've met around the world.
In particular, I want to focus on women, who have historically had a harder time becoming entrepreneurs, Africa, which is mired in poverty and will receive a disproportionate amount of damage from Global Warming, and Southeast Asia, which is my favorite part of the world.
These people, the types of people that Kiva lends to, have tremendous work ethics.
These work ethics, combined with access to capital, is what's going to enable them to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I started off doing environmental policy, working with California decision makers to craft laws to reduce oil consumption.
Now I'm working the entrepreneurial and investment sides of the equation - still with a focus on improving the environment.
My first step is working with a team from a local university to establish a new, advanced battery company.

lender.occupational_info:

After working for several large companies for many years & making other people a lot of money, I decided it was time to take the leap and believe in myself enough to go for it!
In 2005, I started my own Design, Marketing & Photography business.
"Central Florida Designs & Photography"
If you are ever in the need for a down to earth, creative designer, please look me up. I would love to create for you. I have won 3 National Addy Awards from the American Advertising Federation for my designs. I have been featured in several national publications.
Please be sure and check out my site.
You will notice I have a link to the Kiva.org website, in hopes to spread the word! Please add them to your site too!
